content.rendered:
Anyone unfamiliar with the Simpson family has no idea a cartoon can be so humorous! For more than 10 years now, a series of cartoons showing the strangely funny everyday life of the strange Simpson family has been running on American television with unbroken and even growing popularity. Homer, who works at the nuclear power plant and is a little buggy, his wife, Marge, who holds the world record for bunny height, the only crazy boys, Bart, who is always available for all things, the popularity of little family and little baby Maggie Mickey Mouse, Superman and Tapsi Hapsi! The success is no coincidence, as not only because of their flashy yellow appearance, the Simpsons in their adventures portray well-known everyday situations, the best-known stars, politicians and the greatest film successes with extremely original and loud humor.

Seasons: 34 (1989- )

Status: Ongoing

Creator: Matt Groening

Channel: FOX

Starring: Dan Castellaneta, Nancy Cartwright, Harry Shearer
